titleStmt.title: A declaration from York by Sir Francis Wortley ... ; in vindication of himself from divers aspersions and rumours concerning the drawing of his sword, and other actions, wherein he desires to give the world satisfaction.
titleStmt.author: Wortley, Francis, Sir, 1591-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.N. for Thomas Warren,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
